item.title: Pages Markdown Cheatsheet
item.description: Markdown Cheatsheet Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Common text Emphasized text Strikethrough text Strong text Strong emphasized text Named Link and http://www.google.fr/ or http://example.com/ heading-1 Table, like this one : First Header Second Header Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell Adding a pipe | in a cell : First Header Second Header Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell | Left, right and center aligned table
